name: Stellar.io
description:
Hi! This is a lazy .io style game. Relax with music and collect stars across the cosmos. I hope you have a good time.

If you can't catch up with the stars, then just upgrade in the store :D

Control

Mouse - movement

Left mouse button - acceleration

If the head touches the mouse, the speed is reset

Music

1) Heavy_dream

2) Bards Tales
